title: SMC_GroupReadSetJerk (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupReadSetJerk
This function block returns the set-jerk of an axis group
in the selected coordinate system.
Typically, this will be the set-jerk from the end of the previous
cycle.  In order to obtain the set-jerk from the end of the current
cycle,
SMC_GroupUpdate
has to be called before this function block,
or a
TimeOffset
equal to the task interval has to be supplied.
This is an administrative FB, since no movement is generated.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
Get the jerk in the selected coordinate system of the
axis group continuously while enabled

rows:
The time offset in seconds when to evaluate the jerk.
Relative to the start of the current cycle.
